quoteText: irrevocable, worldwide, fully paid up, non-exclusive,
title: The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.

tosdr.case: The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "You hereby grant Blizzard a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, fully paid up, non-exclusive, sub-licensable, right and license to exploit the User Content and all elements thereof, in any and all media, formats and forms, known now or hereafter devised."
